Master Answer:
Two doses of the chickenpox (varicella) vaccine are recommended for adults who have not had chickenpox disease.
You can find more information about the chickenpox vaccine here. 
- Immunization Nurse
Master Question: My son did not get chicken pox as a child. He had the vaccination at school at about age 12. Does he need a booster vaccination now that he is almost 23?
Master Question variation 0: at what age do i stop a child from having chicken pox
Master Question variation 1: at what age should i get a booster vaccine
Master Question variation 2: when do i need a booster vaccination?
